instruction: You are an excellent question responder. Answer the question based on your knowledge.

examplar_1.question: Which William wrote the novel Lord Of The Flies?

examplar_2.question: Where in England was Dame Judi Dench born?

examplar_3.question: Neil Armstrong was a pilot in which war?

examplar_4.question: How many home runs did baseball great Ty Cobb hit in the three world series in which he played?

examplar_5.question: Who had a big 60s No 1 with Tossin' and Turnin'?

examplar_6.question: Which Disney film had the theme tune A Whole New World?

examplar_7.question: In basketball where do the Celtics come from?

examplar_8.question: Which element along with polonium did the Curies discover?

examplar_9.question: Who was the Egyptian king whose tomb an treasures were discovered in the Valley of the Kings in 1922?

examplar_10.question: Where were the 2004 Summer Olympic Games held?

examplar_1.question: How many bottles of champagne are there in a magnum?

examplar_2.question: Rick Baker won the first make-up Oscar for which 1981 horror film set in England?

examplar_3.question: Who introduced the potato and tobacco to Europe.

examplar_4.question: Where in the body does a cataract form?

examplar_5.question: How many copies did Doubleday run off the presses in its first printing of Bill Cosby's 1987 book Time Flies?

examplar_6.question: Which musical featured the song You'll Never Walk Alone?
